summary.title: Summary
summary.content: I am a software engineer with over 4 years of professional experience.
bullets: 5+ years of experience with JavaScript, HTML, & CSS
6+ years of experience with C# & .NET - 2+ years of professional experience
4+ years of experience with Vue.js - 3+ years of professional experience
3+ years of experience with React - 2+ years of professional experience

description.title: Project Smart Retirement Plan
description.content: It's a customer onboarding application for NCB insurance Smart Retirement Plan
bullets: Provided support for the application using the SRUM agile methodology; which was managed in Jira
Developed the frontend of the application using React.js v18 and TypeScript
Developed the backend of the application using Java Spring Boot
Developed the database using MySQL and Redis
Visual Studio Code, Visual Studio, IntelliJ IDEA, Android Studio, Windows, Linux, PowerShell, Git, GitHub
JavaScript, TypeScript, C#, Kotlin, HTMl & CSS
Vue.js/Nuxt.js, React.js/Next.js, Angular, .NET, Node.js, Nestjs, React Native/Expo, UnoCSS, Material UI, Tailwind CSS, & Sass
PostgreSQL, Microsoft SQL Server, MongoDB, MySQL, Supabase, & Redis
